dcterms:creator: Y. Dai

dcterms:description: A dataset with accurate semantic segmentation annotation, but its object detection annotation is very rough. The authors generated the COCO format target detection annotation based on the segmentation annotation.
dcterms:title: SIRST

dcterms:creator: L. Li
L. Jiang
J. Zhang
S. Wang
F. Chen
dcterms:description: A thermal infrared ship detection dataset created using the SDGSAT-1 thermal imaging system, which contains high-resolution images of ships.
dcterms:title: SDGSAT-1 thermal infrared ship detection dataset

dcterms:creator: Z. Song
B. Hui
dcterms:description: A dataset for infrared image dim-small aircraft target detection and tracking under ground/air background, consisting of 22 videos.
dcterms:title: Infrared images for dim small target tracking

dcterms:creator: H. Wang
L. Zhou
L. Wang
dcterms:description: Private datasets used for small object segmentation in infrared images, details not specified.
dcterms:title: Private datasets
